item.title: Ten things I wish I’d known as a fresher
item.author: Felix Editor,Elisabeth J Robinson,
item.description: 1 Cheap tube fares. If you link your national railcard to your oyster card you can get 1⁄3 off off peak tube fares, making it the same to tube as it is to bus a lot of the time. Minimise travel time, maximise predrink time. 2 The property market in London is super fast. You really don’t need …
